abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton attacks congressional Republicans for not choosing to vote on Pres Obama's Supreme Court nominee Merrick B Garland; move signals that she is looking beyond Democratic primary to appeal to independents and moderate Republicans wary of Donald J Trump.
lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton seized on the struggle over the Supreme Court vacancy, issuing a scathing indictment of congressional Republicans and blaming their “extremist tactics” against President Obama for Donald J. Trump’s rise.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Attacks G.O.P. for Not Acting on Obama’s Supreme Court Pick
headline.print_headline: Clinton Attacks G.O.P. for Not Acting on Obama’s Supreme Court Pick

snippet: Hillary Clinton seized on the struggle over the Supreme Court vacancy, issuing a scathing indictment of congressional Republicans and blaming their “extremist tactics” against President Obama for Donald J. Trump’s rise.
